sect2.title: Configurer Sysklogd
sect2.para: Créez un nouveau fichier /etc/syslog.conf en exécutant ce qui suit:
sect2.screen:
cat > /etc/syslog.conf << "EOF" # Debut de /etc/syslog.conf
auth,authpriv.* -/var/log/auth.log *.*;auth,authpriv.none -/var/log/sys.log daemon.* -/var/log/daemon.log kern.* -/var/log/kern.log mail.* -/var/log/mail.log user.* -/var/log/user.log *.emerg *
# Fin de /etc/syslog.conf EOF
